mapper.select: SELECT quiz_id quizId, quiz_no quizNo, question, type FROM quiz WHERE week_id=#{weekId} LIMIT #{page.beginRow},#{page.rowPerPage};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quiz WHERE week_id=#{weekId}
SELECT join_id FROM quiz_join WHERE week_id=#{weekId} AND enrollment_id=#{enrollmentId}
SELECT lecture_id FROM lecture_week WHERE week_id=#{weekId}
SELECT enrollment_id FROM lecture_enrollment WHERE student_id=#{studentId} AND lecture_id=#{lectureId}
SELECT submission_id submissionId FROM quiz_submission WHERE join_id=#{joinId} AND quiz_no=#{quizNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quiz WHERE week_id=#{weekId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quiz_submission WHERE is_correct = 1 AND join_id= #{joinId}
SELECT qs.quiz_no quizNo, case when qs.is_correct = 1 then 'O' ELSE 'X' END isCorrect, qj.score FROM quiz_submission qs INNER JOIN quiz_join qj ON qs.join_id = qj.join_id WHERE qs.join_id=#{joinId}
SELECT quiz_no quizNo, explanation FROM quiz WHERE week_id = #{weekId}
mapper.update: UPDATE quiz_submission SET answer=#{answer} WHERE submission_id=#{submissionId}

UPDATE quiz_submission qs INNER JOIN quiz_join qj ON qs.join_id = qj.join_id INNER JOIN quiz q ON qj.week_id = q.week_id AND qs.quiz_no = q.quiz_no SET qs.is_correct = CASE WHEN qs.answer = q.correct_answer THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE qs.join_id = #{joinId};
UPDATE quiz_join SET score = #{correctQuestion}/#{totalQuestion}*100 WHERE join_id=#{joinId}
